snippet: James Sanders, 16, is suspected of firing the shot that killed Richard Salvia on a desolate Staten Island street.
abstract: Police arrest teenagers James Sanders, Otoniel Carty and Devin Hill on second-degree murder charges in fatal shooting of Chinese restaurant deliveryman Richard Salvia on a desolate street on north shore of Staten Island; police say three had planned to rob Salvia but that after he was shot they apparently took nothing.
lead_paragraph: James Sanders, 16, is suspected of firing the shot that killed Richard Salvia on a desolate Staten Island street.
